useCase.name: User Registration
useCase.description: User registers by providing email and password or using social login.

failureEndConditions.condition: User registration failed due to invalid email or password.

mainSequence.step: User starts registration by providing email and password or using social login.
Authorization Service validates email format and password strength.
Authorization Service checks for existing user.
Data Service saves initial user data with status as unverified.
Email Service sends confirmation email with verification link.
User confirms email by clicking on the verification link.
Authorization Service updates user status to verified.
